mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_password, user_nickname, user_email, user_reg_date, user_mod_date) values(#{user_id},#{user_password},#{user_nickname}, #{user_email}, sysdate(), sysdate())
mapper.select: select user_id, user_password, user_nickname, user_email, user_reg_date, user_mod_date from user where user_id = #{user_id} and user_password = #{user_password}

select u.user_nickname as user_nickname_group_header,g.group_name,g.group_category,g.group_is_secret, g.group_password,g.group_person_count,g.group_content,g.group_reg_date,count(gr1.user_id) as group_join_person_number from group_user_relationship gr1 join group_user_relationship gr2 on gr1.group_id = gr2.group_id inner join group_table g on gr2.group_id = g.group_id inner join user u on g.user_id_group_header = u.user_id where gr2.user_id = #{user_id} group by gr1.group_id
select user_nickname from user where user_id = #{user_id}
select user_id from user where user_email = #{user_email}
